name: Falcon 2023（猎鹰2023）
description:
Story background

As the city with the worst public security in S country, Flora is plagued by numerous violent incidents. The local police station is unable to handle so many violent incidents, so they have to spend a lot of money hiring some temporary special police officers and receive simple training to deal with these thugs. However, the strength of terrorists should not be underestimated. Their armed forces are very strong, seemingly coming again. They have bulletproof shields, sniper rifles, well-equipped, well-trained, and sent out batches of special police officers who have never returned. Of course, with the exposure of the attack in Flala, it has attracted widespread attention from all over the country. The President ordered the gathering of forces from all sides to bring these thugs to justice, By combining temporary special police and formal special police (with the protagonist being a formal special police), a Falcon Squad is formed to jointly respond to public violence incidents.

Introduction to Ranks

The rank upgrade mechanism used in this game is Rank-Like01
The details of the segment bitmap are as follows. According to the player's KDA value, the new player's level will be hidden, but there is no need to worry too much. In any mode, any level, completing three rounds of the game with normal difficulty or above can unlock the level!

Introduction to maps and modes

As of 1/3/2024
Game version Beta1.0
There are a total of four maps (slums, nightclubs, bases, and abandoned factories), with modes including (kill targets, bomb disposal, hostage rescue)
Slums
On the night of December 15, 2015
A group of terrorists launched indiscriminate attacks on the crowd, taking elderly and children as hostages. Young adults and women were executed by firing squad, and bombs were planted in the central area of the square. The sheriff ordered you to scout and eliminate the enemy.

Base
November 25, 2015 Time Random
The largest explosion-proof material warehouse in Flala was robbed, and many special police officers stationed there were shot dead by heavy machine guns from the hijacker's helicopter, almost completely annihilating the entire army. Only two special police officers escaped in a backup helicopter.

Nightclub
On the night of October 21, 2015
Terrorists disguised themselves as guests and waiters entering the nightclub, prepared firearms hidden in the garbage truck, shot at the dancing guests in the nightclub, broke into VIP private rooms, and killed the nightclub manager. They rushed everyone to the lobby of the nightclub and shot them directly from top to bottom. Blood stained every corner of the nightclub, and corpses piled up like mountains. They chopped off the heads of the guests and opened the door of the nightclub, He threw his head directly in front of the door of the nightclub.

Abandoned factory
Mr. Ramon, a legislator from Flair City, has been kidnapped by terrorists and locked up in an abandoned factory in the suburbs. You have accepted this task and will go to rescue him

Game features

1. Realistic and realistic firearm feel
2. A hardcore combat atmosphere
3. Simulate real anti-terrorism scenarios
4. Powerful artificial intelligence
5. Ranking chart+Steam monitoring online

For developers

This game is an independent game, Sun_ Official is created using Unreal Engine 5. Although there are some incomplete parts, I will make all necessary modifications and optimizations to fix some issues to the best of my ability. I will quietly inform you that after going online, it may include a map editor!
